data:
## function_createTree
> **createTree**(`props`?): [`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)

Create a Tree with given config props

### Parameters

#### props?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)\>

### Returns

[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)

a TreeWidget

## function_DefaultTreeSlotItem
> **DefaultTreeSlotItem**(`slotContext`): `Element`

A functional component that renders a tree item element with a directive applied to it.
The directive is provided through the `slotContext` parameter.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)

The context object containing the directives and item for the tree item element.

### Returns

`Element`

A tree root element with the applied directive.

## function_DefaultTreeSlotItemContent
> **DefaultTreeSlotItemContent**(`slotContext`): `Element`

A functional component that renders a tree item content element.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)

The context object containing the item content for display.

### Returns

`Element`

A tree item element.

## function_DefaultTreeSlotItemToggle
> **DefaultTreeSlotItemToggle**(`slotContext`): `Element`

A functional component that renders a toggle element with a directive applied to it.
The directive is provided through the `slotContext` parameter.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)

The context object containing the directives and item the toggle.

### Returns

`Element`

A toggle element with the applied directive.

## function_DefaultTreeSlotStructure
> **DefaultTreeSlotStructure**(`slotContext`): `Element`

A functional component that renders a tree structure with a directive applied to it.
The directive is provided through the `slotContext` parameter.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)

The context object containing the directives and items for the tree display.

### Returns

`Element`

A tree structure with the applied directive.

## function_getTreeDefaultConfig
> **getTreeDefaultConfig**(): [`TreeProps`](#treeprops)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Tree config

### Returns

[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)

the default Tree config

## interface_NormalizedTreeItem
Normalized TreeItem object

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Accessibility label for the node

***

#### children

> **children**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)[]

An array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`

If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`

String title of the node

***

#### level

> **level**: `number`

Level in the hierarchy, starts with 0 for a root node

## function_Tree
> **Tree**(`props`): `Element`

Tree component that integrates with a widget context and renders a slot structure.

### Parameters

#### props

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)\>

The properties for the Tree component.

### Returns

`Element`

The rendered Tree component.

The Tree component uses the useWidgetWithConfig hook to create a widget context with the provided
configuration. It renders the slot content using the `Slot` component.

## interface_TreeApi
Interface representing the API for a Tree component.

## type alias_TreeContext
> **TreeContext**: [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)\>

Represents the context for a Tree widget.
This interface is an alias for `WidgetSlotContext<TreeWidget>`.

## interface_TreeDirectives
Interface representing various directives used in the Tree component.

### Properties

#### itemAttributesDirective

> **itemAttributesDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `item`: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem); \}\>

Directive to handle attributes for the tree item

***

#### itemToggleDirective

> **itemToggleDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `item`: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem); \}\>

Directive to handle toggle for the tree item

***

#### navigationDirective

> **navigationDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Directive to attach navManager for the tree

## interface_TreeItem
Represents a tree item component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the node

***

#### children?

> `optional` **children**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Optional array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`

If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`

String title of the node

## interface_TreeProps
Represents the properties for the Tree component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the tree if there is no explicit label

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaLabelToggleFn

> **ariaLabelToggleFn**: (`label`) => `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute of the toggle

##### Parameters

###### label

`string`

tree item label

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(label: string) => `Toggle ${label}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### nodes

> **nodes**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Array of the tree nodes to display

##### Default Value

`[]`

***

#### onExpandToggle

> **onExpandToggle**: (`node`) => `void`

An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Parameters

###### node

[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the tree

### Methods

#### navSelector

> **navSelector**(`node`): `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLButtonElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLButtonElement)\>

Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Parameters

###### node

[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Returns

`NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLButtonElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLButtonElement)\>

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```

## type alias_TreeSlotItemContext
> **TreeSlotItemContext**: [`TreeContext`](#treecontext) & `object`

Represents the context for a tree item, extending the base `TreeContext`
with an additional `item` property.

### Type declaration

#### item

> **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

## interface_TreeState
Represents the state of a Tree component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the tree if there is no explicit label

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### expandedMap

> **expandedMap**: `object`

Getter of expanded state for each tree node

##### get

###### Parameters

####### item

[`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

###### Returns

`undefined` \| `boolean`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### normalizedNodes

> **normalizedNodes**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)[]

Array of normalized tree nodes

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the tree

## type alias_TreeWidget
> **TreeWidget**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops), [`TreeState`](#treestate), [`TreeApi`](#treeapi), [`TreeDirectives`](#treedirectives)\>

Represents a Tree widget component.
